一，翻转型：
a) 四开
    B 	A
 I  x   x
 O  x   x
1: B/I
	press：
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 32 15 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 
	release：
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 00 B7 
2：A/I
	press:
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 31 25 00 00 00 00 00 00 8F 
	release：	
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 00 25 00 00 00 00 00 00 C5 
3：B/O
	press:
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 22 1D 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 
	release：
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 00 1E 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B 
4: A/O
	press：
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 00 00 88 96 02 21 1C 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF 
	release：	
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 
		00 00 88 96 
		02 00 
		1D 00 00 00 00 00 00 
		5D 
b) 圆形三开

二，rocker型
a) 单开
b) 双开
	1：B/I
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 
		00 00 4A 34 
		01 32 
		1E 00 00 00 00 00 00 F6 
	
	2：A/I
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 
		00 00 4A 34 
		01 00 
		1D 00 00 00 00 00 00 EF 

	3: B/O
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 
		00 00 4A 34 
		01 22 
		1B 00 00 00 00 00 00 6B 
	4: A/O
		55 00 07 07 01 7A 00 
		00 00 4A 34 
		01 00 
		1C 00 00 00 00 00 00 30
